attributes.action: PM Theresa May must be removed from office immediately.
attributes.background: Theresa May has ignored the will of every British person who voted for Brexit by agreeing to a deal with the EU in name only with hardly any changes taking place at all. She must be removed with a no confidence vote immediately with a replacement put in place who sincerely supports Brexit

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for Ministers, including the Prime Minister, to be sacked or for a vote of no confidence.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or the House of Commons, you could start a petition about that.
